Great Reaching Spirit.name: Great Reaching Spirit
Great Reaching Spirit.flavor: Your spirit companion reaches out to its full length and slams your enemies, catching them off guard and forcing them to hesitate for a moment.
Great Reaching Spirit.range: Melee spirit 1 (or 2 if your spirit companion is Large)
Great Reaching Spirit.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +2 bonus to all defenses while adjacent to your spirit companion.

An End to Tolerance.name: An End to Tolerance
An End to Tolerance.flavor: Moved to anger, the World Spirit allows none to escape.
An End to Tolerance.onHit: 4d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
An End to Tolerance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to your spirit companion chooses either to be dazed until the end of its turn or to take psychic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Great Hymn of Nature.name: Great Hymn of Nature
Great Hymn of Nature.flavor: In the spirit world, the song is many-layered and hours long. In the natural world, you hum three bars and the spirits do the rest.
Great Hymn of Nature.effect: You make a Nature check. Until the end of your next turn, your allies can use the result of that check in place of their defenses while adjacent to your spirit companion.
